price: 27. Mpo ete Nkolo na ngai alimbisi ngai mpe atie ngai o molongo ya bato ya lokumu.
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
